topic.title: Idea] Manage folders of favorites sites
topic.body:
Hi,

Is it possible to create a functionality to manage folders to arrange favorite sites according to  themes / utilities ?

topic.title: Idea] Ability to rename a visited site
topic.body:
Hi,

Is it possible to create a functionality to rename visited site in the left bar ?
For example when the author left the hash as title, we can't remember its utility.

topic.title: Ability to search terms in a ZeroTalk forum
topic.body:
Hi,

Is it possible to add a search bar to find some words in a ZeroTalk forum ?

topic.title: Idea] AlternativeTo Concept
topic.body:
Hi,

Is it possible to add to the ZeroNet network, the concept of AlternativeTo ?
Every application has alternatives and it is listed in it.
People add the application and other check if it is the same theme / a proper alternative
And everyone can vote for their favorite applications.

http://alternativeto.net/software/alternativeto/
Currently this concept is not open-source and not distributed.

topic.title: Idea] Private instant messaging
topic.body:
Hi,

Is it possible to develop a private instant messaging ( like Tox ) ?

topic.title: What is the licence ?
topic.body:
Hi,

I am questioning about what kind of GNU licence is it ?

topic.title: Internal error: TypeError: string indices must be integers, not tuple
topic.body:
When I trying to publish my update of my blog via the HTML interface :  
UiWebsocket.py line 99 > UiWebsocket.py line 178 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 127 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 121 > UiWebsocket.py line 402

1604065377_mirrored_mcl1234_github.body: This is an idea of application on this network ;)

Some can delete softwares , like owncloud
7th april 2016 : https://ipfs.pics/QmcRwEMDZVwNJZ4wjrnHRYuWP6trLYAyVqCGLHqPHT8GeR
now there is no owncloud listed in the application server

and it crashes sometimes with ASPx

1604065379_mirrored_mcl1234_github.body: Yes , and finally Tox has the Distributed Hash Table , so it is more interesting.
